title: f) If the owner / developer desires to avail such higher F
clause_text: f) If the owner / developer desires to avail such higher F.S.I. in future for new buildings, then while seeking building permission at first instance, the building plan shall be submitted considering the marginal distances as required for the height of buildings for such higher
section: Buildings Abutting Two or More Streets
